name: CUSTOM Pricing table #5
liquid_code:
<link
  rel="stylesheet"
  href="https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/npm/swiper@11/swiper-bundle.min.css"
/>

{%- liquid 
  assign padding_horizontal = section.settings.padding_horizontal
  assign padding_horizontal_mobile = section.settings.padding_horizontal_mobile
  assign padding_top = section.settings.padding_top
  assign padding_bottom = section.settings.padding_bottom
  assign border_color = section.settings.border_color
  assign border_thickness = section.settings.border_thickness
  assign margin_top = section.settings.margin_top
  assign margin_bottom = section.settings.margin_bottom
  assign margin_horizontal_mobile = section.settings.margin_horizontal_mobile
  assign margin_horizontal = section.settings.margin_horizontal
  assign background_color = section.settings.background_color
  assign background_gradient = section.settings.background_gradient
  assign full_width = section.settings.full_width
  assign content_width = section.settings.content_width
  assign section_radius = section.settings.section_radius

  assign tabs_border_thickness = section.settings.tabs_border_thickness
  assign tabs_border_color = section.settings.tabs_border_color
  assign tabs_radius = section.settings.tabs_radius
  assign tabs_bg_color = section.settings.tabs_bg_color
  assign tabs_mt = section.settings.tabs_mt
  assign tabs_mt_mobile = section.settings.tabs_mt_mobile

  assign tab_custom = section.settings.tab_custom
  assign tab_font = section.settings.tab_font
  assign tab_size = section.settings.tab_size
  assign tab_size_mobile = section.settings.tab_size_mobile
  assign tab_height = section.settings.tab_height
  assign tab_color = section.settings.tab_color  
  assign tab_bg_color = section.settings.tab_bg_color
  assign tab_active_color = section.settings.tab_active_color  
  assign tab_bg_active_color = section.settings.tab_bg_active_color
  assign tab_bg_active_gradient = section.settings.tab_bg_active_gradient
  assign tab_padding_horizontal = section.settings.tab_padding_horizontal  
  assign tab_padding_horizontal_mobile = section.settings.tab_padding_horizontal_mobile
  assign tab_padding_vertical = section.settings.tab_padding_vertical  
  assign tab_padding_vertical_mobile = section.settings.tab_padding_vertical_mobile
  assign tab_radius = section.settings.tab_radius
  assign tab_border_thickness = section.settings.tab_border_thickness
  assign tab_border_color = section.settings.tab_border_color
  assign tab_border_active_color = section.settings.tab_border_active_color
  assign tab_shadow = section.settings.tab_shadow

  assign cards_per_row = section.settings.cards_per_row
  assign cards_gap = section.settings.cards_gap
  assign cards_gap_mobile = section.settings.cards_gap_mobile
  assign cards_mt = section.settings.cards_mt
  assign cards_mt_mobile = section.settings.cards_mt_mobile

  assign card_padding_vertical = section.settings.card_padding_vertical
  assign card_padding_vertical_mobile = section.settings.card_padding_vertical_mobile
  assign card_padding_horizontal = section.settings.card_padding_horizontal
  assign card_padding_horizontal_mobile = section.settings.card_padding_horizontal_mobile
  assign card_border_thickness = section.settings.card_border_thickness
  assign card_radius = section.settings.card_radius
  assign card_align = section.settings.card_align
  assign card_align_mobile = section.settings.card_align_mobile

  assign title_custom = section.settings.title_custom
  assign title_font = section.settings.title_font
  assign title_size = section.settings.title_size
  assign title_size_mobile = section.settings.title_size_mobile
  assign title_height = section.settings.title_height 
  
  assign text_custom = section.settings.text_custom
  assign text_font = section.settings.text_font
  assign text_size = section.settings.text_size
  assign text_size_mobile = section.settings.text_size_mobile
  assign text_height = section.settings.text_height
  assign text_mt = section.settings.text_mt
  assign text_mt_mobile = section.settings.text_mt_mobile

  assign price_second_text = section.settings.price_second_text
  assign price_custom = section.settings.price_custom
  assign price_font = section.settings.price_font
  assign price_size = section.settings.price_size
  assign price_size_mobile = section.settings.price_size_mobile
  assign price_height = section.settings.price_height
  assign price_mt = section.settings.price_mt
  assign price_mt_mobile = section.settings.price_mt_mobile

  assign button_size = section.settings.button_size
  assign button_size_mobile = section.settings.button_size_mobile 
  assign button_custom = section.settings.button_custom
  assign button_font = section.settings.button_font
  assign button_height = section.settings.button_height
  assign button_padding_vertical = section.settings.button_padding_vertical
  assign button_padding_vertical_mobile = section.settings.button_padding_vertical_mobile
  assign button_padding_horizontal = section.settings.button_padding_horizontal
  assign button_padding_horizontal_mobile = section.settings.button_padding_horizontal_mobile
  assign button_mt = section.settings.button_mt
  assign button_mt_mobile = section.settings.button_mt_mobile
  assign button_radius = section.settings.button_radius
  assign button_border_thickness = section.settings.button_border_thickness
  assign button_style = section.settings.button_style

  assign table_border_thickness = section.settings.table_border_thickness
  assign table_mt = section.settings.table_mt
  assign table_mt_mobile = section.settings.table_mt_mobile
  assign table_padding_vertical = section.settings.table_padding_vertical
  assign table_padding_vertical_mobile = section.settings.table_padding_vertical_mobile

  assign table_left_custom = section.settings.table_left_custom
  assign table_left_font = section.settings.table_left_font
  assign table_left_size = section.settings.table_left_size
  assign table_left_size_mobile = section.settings.table_left_size_mobile
  assign table_left_height = section.settings.table_left_height

  assign table_right_custom = section.settings.table_right_custom
  assign table_right_font = section.settings.table_right_font
  assign table_right_size = section.settings.table_right_size
  assign table_right_size_mobile = section.settings.table_right_size_mobile
  assign table_right_height = section.settings.table_right_height
-%}

{%- style -%}
  {{ tab_font | font_face: font_display: 'swap' }}
  {{ title_font | font_face: font_display: 'swap' }}
  {{ text_font | font_face: font_display: 'swap' }}
  {{ price_font | font_face: font_display: 'swap' }}
  {{ button_font | font_face: font_display: 'swap' }}
  {{ table_left_font | font_face: font_display: 'swap' }}
  {{ table_right_font | font_face: font_display: 'swap' }}

  .section-{{ section.id }} {
    border-top: solid {{ border_color }} {{ border_thickness }}px;
    border-bottom: solid {{ border_color }} {{ border_thickness }}px;
    margin-top: {{ margin_top | times: 0.75 | round: 0 }}px;
    margin-bottom: {{ margin_bottom | times: 0.75 | round: 0 }}px;
    margin-left: {{ margin_horizontal_mobile }}rem;
    margin-right: {{ margin_horizontal_mobile }}rem;
    border-radius: {{ section_radius | times: 0.6 | round: 0 }}px;
    overflow: hidden;
  }
  
  .section-{{ section.id }}-settings {
    margin: 0 auto;
    padding-top: {{ padding_top | times: 0.75 | round: 0 }}px;
    padding-bottom: {{ padding_bottom | times: 0.75 | round: 0 }}px;
    padding-left: {{ padding_horizontal_mobile }}rem;
    padding-right: {{ padding_horizontal_mobile }}rem;
  }

  .pricing-toggles-{{ section.id }} {
    display: flex;
    align-items: center;    
    border-radius: {{ tabs_radius }}px;
    padding: 5px;
    background-color: {{ tabs_bg_color }};
    border: {{ tabs_border_thickness }}px solid {{ tabs_border_color }};
    max-width: fit-content;
    margin: 0 auto;
    margin-top: {{ tabs_mt_mobile }}px;
  }

  .pricing-toggle-{{ section.id }} {
    padding: {{ tab_padding_vertical_mobile }}px {{ tab_padding_horizontal_mobile }}px;
    border-radius: {{ tab_radius }}px;
    border: {{ tab_border_thickness }}px solid {{ tab_border_color }};
    background-color: {{ tab_bg_color }};
    margin: 0;    
    text-align: center;
    text-transform: unset;
    word-wrap: break-word;
    font-size: {{ tab_size_mobile }}px;
    line-height: {{ tab_height }}%;
    color: {{ tab_color }};  
    cursor: pointer;
    font-weight: 700;
  }

  .pricing-toggle-{{ section.id }}.active {
    border: {{ tab_border_thickness }}px solid {{ tab_border_active_color }};
    background-color: {{ tab_bg_active_color }};
    background-image: {{ tab_bg_active_gradient }};
    color: {{ tab_active_color }};  
  }

  .pricing-cards-{{ section.id }} {
    display: none;
    grid-template-columns: 1fr;
    gap: {{ cards_gap_mobile }}px;
    margin-top: {{ cards_mt_mobile }}px;
  }

  .pricing-cards-{{ section.id }}.active {
    display: grid;
  }

  .pricing-card-{{ section.id }} {
    padding: {{ card_padding_vertical_mobile }}px {{ card_padding_horizontal_mobile }}px;
    border-radius: {{ card_radius }}px;
    overflow: hidden;
    display: flex;
    flex-direction: column;
    justify-content: space-between;
  }

  .pricing-title-{{ section.id }} {
    margin: 0;    
    text-align: {{ card_align_mobile }};
    text-transform: unset;
    font-size: {{ title_size_mobile }}px;
    line-height: {{ title_height }}%;
    font-weight: 700;
  }

  .pricing-text-{{ section.id }} {
    text-align: {{ card_align_mobile }};
    margin-top: {{ text_mt_mobile }}px;
  }

  .pricing-text-{{ section.id }} * {
    margin: 0;        
    text-transform: unset;
    font-size: {{ text_size_mobile }}px;
    line-height: {{ text_height }}%;
  }

  .pricing-price-{{ section.id }} {
    text-align: {{ card_align_mobile }};
    margin-top: {{ price_mt_mobile }}px;
    display: flex;
    align-items: center;
    flex-wrap: wrap;
    justify-content: {{ card_align_mobile }};
  }

  .pricing-price-{{ section.id }} * {
    margin: 0;        
    text-transform: unset;
    font-size: {{ price_size_mobile }}px;
    line-height: {{ price_height }}%;
    font-weight: 700;
  }

  .pricing-price-{{ section.id }} span {
    font-size: {{ price_size_mobile | times: 0.5 }}px;
  }
  
  .pricing-card-button-{{ section.id }} {
    display: flex;
    align-items: center;
    justify-content: center;
    gap: 10px;
    width: 100%;
    margin: 0;
    margin-top: {{ button_mt_mobile }}px;
    font-size: {{ button_size_mobile }}px;
    line-height: {{ button_height }}%;
    text-align: center;
    text-transform: unset;
    text-decoration: none;
    padding: {{ button_padding_vertical_mobile }}px {{ button_padding_horizontal_mobile }}px;
    border-radius: {{ button_radius }}px;
    transition: all 0.25s ease 0s;
    background-color: transparent;
    border: 0px;
    cursor: pointer;
    font-weight: 700;
    min-width: max-content;
  }

  .pricing-card-button-inner-{{ section.id }} {
    margin: 0px;
    display: flex;
    align-items: center;
    justify-content: center;
    gap: 10px;
  }

  .pricing-card-button-{{ section.id }} svg {
    width: 14px;
    height: 14px;
  }

  .pricing-card-table-{{ section.id }} {
    margin-top: {{ table_mt_mobile }}px;
  }

  .pricing-card-table-item-{{ section.id }} {
    display: flex;
    align-items: center;
    justify-content: space-between;
    padding: {{ table_padding_vertical_mobile }}px 0px;
  }
  
  .pricing-card-table-left-{{ section.id }} {
    margin: 0;    
    text-align: left;
    text-transform: unset;
    font-size: {{ table_left_size_mobile }}px;
    line-height: {{ table_left_height }}%;
  }

  .pricing-card-table-right-{{ section.id }} {
    margin: 0;    
    text-align: right;
    text-transform: unset;
    font-size: {{ table_right_size_mobile }}px;
    line-height: {{ table_right_height }}%;
    font-weight: 700;
  }

  @media(min-width: 1024px) {

    .section-{{ section.id }} {
      margin-top: {{ margin_top }}px;
      margin-bottom: {{ margin_bottom }}px;
      margin-left: {{ margin_horizontal }}rem;
      margin-right: {{ margin_horizontal }}rem;
      border-radius: {{ section_radius }}px;
    }
    
    .section-{{ section.id }}-settings {
      padding: 0 5rem;
      padding-top: {{ padding_top }}px;
      padding-bottom: {{ padding_bottom }}px;
      padding-left: {{ padding_horizontal }}rem;
      padding-right: {{ padding_horizontal }}rem;
    }

    .pricing-toggles-{{ section.id }} {     
      margin-top: {{ tabs_mt }}px;
    }

    .pricing-toggle-{{ section.id }} {
      padding: {{ tab_padding_vertical }}px {{ tab_padding_horizontal }}px;    
      font-size: {{ tab_size }}px;
    }

    .pricing-cards-{{ section.id }} {
      grid-template-columns: repeat({{ cards_per_row }}, 1fr);
      gap: {{ cards_gap }}px;
      margin-top: {{ cards_mt }}px;
    }

    .pricing-card-{{ section.id }} {
      padding: {{ card_padding_vertical }}px {{ card_padding_horizontal }}px;
    }
    
    .pricing-title-{{ section.id }} {
      text-align: {{ card_align }};
      font-size: {{ title_size }}px;
    }

    .pricing-text-{{ section.id }} {
      text-align: {{ card_align }};
      margin-top: {{ text_mt }}px;
    }

    .pricing-text-{{ section.id }} * {
      font-size: {{ text_size }}px;
    }

    .pricing-price-{{ section.id }} {
      text-align: {{ card_align }};
      margin-top: {{ price_mt }}px;
      justify-content: {{ card_align }};
    }

    .pricing-price-{{ section.id }} * {
      font-size: {{ price_size }}px;
    }

    .pricing-price-{{ section.id }} span {
      font-size: {{ price_size | times: 0.5 }}px;
    }

    .pricing-card-button-{{ section.id }} {    
      margin-top: {{ button_mt }}px;
      font-size: {{ button_size }}px;     
      padding: {{ button_padding_vertical }}px {{ button_padding_horizontal }}px;
    }

    .pricing-card-table-{{ section.id }} {
      margin-top: {{ table_mt }}px;
    }
  
    .pricing-card-table-item-{{ section.id }} {
      padding: {{ table_padding_vertical }}px 0px;
    }

    .pricing-card-table-left-{{ section.id }} {
      font-size: {{ table_left_size }}px;
    }

    .pricing-card-table-right-{{ section.id }} {
      font-size: {{ table_right_size }}px;
    }
  }
  
{%- endstyle -%}

{% unless full_width %}
  <style>
    .section-{{ section.id }}-settings {
      max-width: {{ content_width }}px;
    }
  </style>
{% endunless %}

{% if margin_horizontal_mobile > 0 %}
  <style>
    .section-{{ section.id }} {
      border-left: solid {{ border_color }} {{ border_thickness }}px;
      border-right: solid {{ border_color }} {{ border_thickness }}px;
    }
    
    @media(min-width: 1024px) {
      .section-{{ section.id }} {
        border-left: 0px;
        border-right: 0px;
      }
    }
  </style>
{% endif %}

{% if margin_horizontal > 0 %}
  <style>
    @media(min-width: 1024px) {
      .section-{{ section.id }} {
        border-left: solid {{ border_color }} {{ border_thickness }}px;
        border-right: solid {{ border_color }} {{ border_thickness }}px;
      }
    }
  </style>
{% endif %}


{% if tab_custom %}
  <style>
    .pricing-toggle-{{ section.id }} {
      font-family: {{ tab_font.family }}, {{ tab_font.fallback_families }};
      font-weight: {{ tab_font.weight }};
      font-style: {{ tab_font.style }};
    }
  </style>
{% endif %}

{% if title_custom %}
  <style>
    .pricing-title-{{ section.id }} {
      font-family: {{ title_font.family }}, {{ title_font.fallback_families }};
      font-weight: {{ title_font.weight }};
      font-style: {{ title_font.style }};
    }
  </style>
{% endif %}

{% if text_custom %}
  <style>
    .pricing-text-{{ section.id }} * {
      font-family: {{ text_font.family }}, {{ text_font.fallback_families }};
      font-weight: {{ text_font.weight }};
      font-style: {{ text_font.style }};
    }
  </style>
{% endif %}

{% if price_custom %}
  <style>
    .pricing-price-{{ section.id }} * {
      font-family: {{ price_font.family }}, {{ price_font.fallback_families }};
      font-weight: {{ price_font.weight }};
      font-style: {{ price_font.style }};
    }
  </style>
{% endif %}

{% if button_custom %}
  <style>
    .pricing-card-button-{{ section.id }} {
      font-family: {{ button_font.family }}, {{ button_font.fallback_families }};
      font-weight: {{ button_font.weight }};
      font-style: {{ button_font.style }};
    }
  </style>
{% endif %}

{% if table_left_custom %}
  <style>
    .pricing-card-table-left-{{ section.id }} {
      font-family: {{ table_left_font.family }}, {{ table_left_font.fallback_families }};
      font-weight: {{ table_left_font.weight }};
      font-style: {{ table_left_font.style }};
    }
  </style>
{% endif %}

{% if table_right_custom %}
  <style>
    .pricing-card-table-right-{{ section.id }} {
      font-family: {{ table_right_font.family }}, {{ table_right_font.fallback_families }};
      font-weight: {{ table_right_font.weight }};
      font-style: {{ table_right_font.style }};
    }
  </style>
{% endif %}

{% if tab_shadow %}
  <style>
    .pricing-toggle-{{ section.id }}.active {
      box-shadow: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.08) 0px 1px 3px 0px;
    }
  </style>
{% endif %}

{% for block in section.blocks %}
  {% case block.type %}
    {% when 'card' %}
      <style>
        .pricing-card-{{ block.id }} {
          background-color: {{ block.settings.card_bg_color }};
          border: {{ card_border_thickness }}px solid {{ block.settings.card_border_color }};
        }

        .pricing-title-{{ block.id }} {
          color: {{ block.settings.title_color }};
        }

        .pricing-text-{{ block.id }} * {
          color: {{ block.settings.text_color }};
        }

        .pricing-price-{{ block.id }} * {
          color: {{ block.settings.price_color }};
        }
        
        .pricing-card-button-{{ block.id }} {
          color: {{ block.settings.button_color }};         
        }

        .pricing-card-button-{{ block.id }}:hover {
          color: {{ block.settings.button_hover_color }};
        }

        .pricing-card-button-{{ block.id }} svg path {
          fill: {{ block.settings.button_color }};
        }

        .pricing-card-button-{{ block.id }}:hover svg path {
          fill: {{ block.settings.button_hover_color }};
        }

        .pricing-card-table-item-{{ block.id }} {
          border-top: {{ table_border_thickness }}px solid {{ block.settings.table_border_color }};
        }

        .pricing-card-table-right-{{ block.id }} {
          color: {{ block.settings.table_right_color }};
        }

        .pricing-card-table-left-{{ block.id }} {
          color: {{ block.settings.table_left_color }};
        }
      </style>

      {% if button_style == "non_outline" or button_style == "non_outline_arrow" %}
        <style>
          .pricing-card-button-{{ block.id }} {
            background-color: {{ block.settings.button_bg_color }};
            background-image: {{ block.settings.button_bg_gradient }};
          }

          .pricing-card-button-{{ block.id }}:hover {
            background-color: {{ block.settings.button_bg_hover_color }};
            background-image: {{ block.settings.button_bg_hover_gradient }};
          }
        </style>
      {% elsif button_style == "outline" or button_style == "outline_arrow" %}
        <style>
          .pricing-card-button-{{ block.id }} {
            background-color: {{ block.settings.button_bg_color }};
            background-image: {{ block.settings.button_bg_gradient }};
            border: {{ button_border_thickness }}px solid {{ block.settings.button_border_color }};
          }

          .pricing-card-button-{{ block.id }}:hover {
            background-color: {{ block.settings.button_bg_hover_color }};
            background-image: {{ block.settings.button_bg_hover_gradient }};
            border: {{ button_border_thickness }}px solid {{ block.settings.button_border_hover_color }};
          }
        </style>
      {% elsif button_style == "link" %}
        <style>
          .pricing-card-button-{{ block.id }} {
            padding: 0px !important;
          }
        </style>
      {% endif %}
    {% when 'heading' %}
      <style>
        {{  block.settings.heading_font | font_face: font_display: 'swap' }}

        .pricing-heading-{{ block.id }} {
          margin-top: {{ block.settings.heading_mt_mobile }}px;
          text-align: {{ block.settings.heading_align_mobile }};
          position: relative;
          z-index: 2;
        }

        .pricing-heading-{{ block.id }} * {          
          margin: 0;            
          font-size: {{ block.settings.heading_size_mobile }}px;
          color: {{ block.settings.heading_color }};
          line-height: {{ block.settings.heading_height }}%;
          text-transform: unset;
          text-decoration: none;
          word-break: break-word;
          font-weight: 700;
        }          

        @media(min-width: 1024px) {
          .pricing-heading-{{ block.id }} {
            margin-top: {{ block.settings.heading_mt }}px;
            text-align: {{ block.settings.heading_align }};
          }

          .pricing-heading-{{ block.id }} * {                
            font-size: {{ block.settings.heading_size }}px;
          }  
        }
      </style>

      {% if block.settings.heading_custom %}
        <style>
          .pricing-heading-{{ block.id }} * {
            font-family: {{ block.settings.heading_font.family }}, {{ block.settings.heading_font.fallback_families }};
            font-weight: {{ block.settings.heading_font.weight }};
            font-style: {{ block.settings.heading_font.style }};
          }
        </style>
      {% endif %}

    {% when 'caption' %}
      <style>
        {{  block.settings.text_font | font_face: font_display: 'swap' }}

        .pricing-bottom-text-{{ block.id }} {      
          margin-top: {{ block.settings.text_mt_mobile }}px;
          text-align: {{ block.settings.text_align_mobile }};
          font-weight: 400;
        }

        .pricing-bottom-text-{{ block.id }} * {          
          margin: 0;            
          font-size: {{ block.settings.text_size_mobile }}px;
          color: {{ block.settings.text_color }};
          line-height: {{ block.settings.text_height }}%;
          text-transform: unset;
          text-decoration: none;
          word-break: break-word;
        }          

        @media(min-width: 1024px) {
          .pricing-bottom-text-{{ block.id }} {
            margin-top: {{ block.settings.text_mt }}px;
            text-align: {{ block.settings.text_align }};
            max-width: {{ block.settings.text_max_width }}%;
          }

          .pricing-bottom-text-{{ block.id }} * {                
            font-size: {{ block.settings.text_size }}px;
          }  
        }
      </style>

      {% if block.settings.text_custom %}
        <style>
          .pricing-bottom-text-{{ block.id }} * {
            font-family: {{ block.settings.text_font.family }}, {{ block.settings.text_font.fallback_families }};
            font-weight: {{ block.settings.text_font.weight }};
            font-style: {{ block.settings.text_font.style }};
          }
        </style>
      {% endif %}
      
      {% if block.settings.text_align == "center" %}
        <style>
          @media(min-width: 1024px) {
            .pricing-bottom-text-{{ block.id }} {
              margin-left: auto;
              margin-right: auto;
            } 
          }
        </style>
      {% elsif block.settings.text_align == "right" %}
        <style>
          @media(min-width: 1024px) {
            .pricing-bottom-text-{{ block.id }} {
              margin-left: auto;
              margin-right: 0px;
            } 
          }
        </style>
      {% else %}
        <style>
          @media(min-width: 1024px) {
            .pricing-bottom-text-{{ block.id }} {
              margin-left: 0px;
              margin-right: 0px;
            } 
          }
        </style>
      {% endif %}

    {% when 'button' %}  
      <style>
        {{  block.settings.button_font | font_face: font_display: 'swap' }}

        .pricing-button-{{ block.id }} {
          display: flex;
          align-items: center;
          justify-content: center;
          max-width: fit-content;
          gap: 10px;
          width: 100%;
          margin: 0 auto;      
          margin-top: {{ block.settings.button_mt_mobile }}px;
          font-size: {{ block.settings.button_size_mobile }}px;
          color: {{ block.settings.button_color }};
          line-height: {{ block.settings.button_height }}%;
          text-align: center;
          text-transform: unset;
          text-decoration: none;
          padding: {{ block.settings.button_padding_vertical_mobile }}px {{ block.settings.button_padding_horizontal_mobile }}px;
          border-radius: {{ block.settings.button_radius }}px;
          transition: all 0.3s ease 0s;
          background-color: transparent;
          border: 0px;
          cursor: pointer;
          font-weight: 700;
        }

        .pricing-button-inner-{{ block.id }} {
          margin: 0px;
          display: flex;
          align-items: center;
          justify-content: center;
          gap: 10px;
          text-decoration: none;
        }

        .pricing-button-{{ block.id }}:hover {
          color: {{ block.settings.button_hover_color }};
          transition: all 0.25s ease 0s;
        }

        .pricing-button-{{ block.id }} svg {
          width: 14px;
          height: 14px;
        }

        .pricing-button-{{ block.id }} svg path {
          fill: {{ block.settings.button_color }};
          transition: all 0.25s ease 0s;
        }

        .pricing-button-{{ block.id }}:hover svg path {
          fill: {{ block.settings.button_hover_color }};
          transition: all 0.25s ease 0s;
        }

        @media (min-width: 1024px) {
          .pricing-button-{{ block.id }} {
            margin-top: {{ block.settings.button_mt }}px;
            padding: {{ block.settings.button_padding_vertical }}px {{ block.settings.button_padding_horizontal }}px;
            font-size: {{ block.settings.button_size }}px;
          }
        }
      </style>

      {% if block.settings.use_shadow %}
        <style>
          .pricing-button-{{ block.id }}:hover {
            -webkit-box-shadow: 0px 0px 8px 2px {{ block.settings.button_bg_color }};
            -moz-box-shadow: 0px 0px 8px 2px {{ block.settings.button_bg_color }};
            box-shadow: 0px 0px 8px 2px {{ block.settings.button_bg_color }};
          }
        </style>
      {% endif %}  

      {% if block.settings.button_custom %}
        <style>
          .pricing-button-{{ block.id }} {
            font-family: {{ block.settings.button_font.family }}, {{ block.settings.button_font.fallback_families }};
            font-weight: {{ block.settings.button_font.weight }};
            font-style: {{ block.settings.button_font.style }};
          }
        </style>
      {% endif %}

      {% if block.settings.button_style == "non_outline" or block.settings.button_style == "non_outline_arrow" %}
        <style>
          .pricing-button-{{ block.id }} {
            transition: all 0.3s ease 0s;
            background-color: {{  block.settings.button_bg_color }};
            background-image: {{ block.settings.button_bg_gradient }};
          }
      
          .pricing-button-{{ block.id }}:hover {
            transition: all 0.3s ease 0s;
            background-color: {{  block.settings.button_bg_hover_color }};
            background-image: {{ block.settings.button_bg_hover_gradient }};
          }
        </style>
      {% elsif block.settings.button_style == "outline" or block.settings.button_style == "outline_arrow" %}
        <style>          
          .pricing-button-{{ block.id }} {
            transition: all 0.3s ease 0s;
            background-color: {{  block.settings.button_bg_color }};
            background-image: {{ block.settings.button_bg_gradient }};
            border: {{  block.settings.button_border_thickness }}px solid {{  block.settings.button_border_color }};
          }
      
          .pricing-button-{{ block.id }}:hover {
            transition: all 0.3s ease 0s;
            background-color: {{  block.settings.button_bg_hover_color }};
            background-image: {{ block.settings.button_bg_hover_gradient }};
            border: {{  block.settings.button_border_thickness }}px solid {{ block.settings.button_border_hover_color }};
          }
        </style>
      {% elsif block.settings.button_style == "link" %}
        <style>
          .pricing-button-{{ block.id }} {
            padding: 0px !important;
            text-decoration: underline;
            text-underline-offset: 3px;
            text-decoration-color: {{ block.settings.button_border_color }};
            -webkit-box-shadow: none !important;
            -moz-box-shadow: none !important;
            box-shadow: none !important;
          }

          .pricing-button-{{ block.id }}:hover {
            text-decoration-color: {{ block.settings.button_border_hover_color }};
          }
        </style>
      {% endif %}     
    {% else %}
      
  {% endcase %}
{% endfor %}

<div class="section-{{ section.id }} pricing-{{ section.id }}" style="background-color:{{ background_color }}; background-image: {{ background_gradient }};">
    <div class="section-{{ section.id }}-settings">
      {% for block in section.blocks %}
        {% if block.type == 'heading' %}
          {% if block.settings.heading != blank %}
            <div class="pricing-heading-{{ block.id }}">{{ block.settings.heading }}</div>
          {% endif %}
        {% endif %}
      {% endfor %}

      <div class="pricing-toggles-{{ section.id }}">
        {% for block in section.blocks %}
          {% if block.type == 'tab' %}
            <p class="pricing-toggle-{{ section.id }} {% if block.settings.active_default %}active{% endif %}" id="{{ block.id }}">{{ block.settings.tab }}</p>
          {% endif %}     
        {% endfor %}
      </div>

      <div class="pricing-tabs-{{ section.id }}">
        {% assign inside_item = false %} 
        {% for block in section.blocks %}
          {% if block.type == 'tab' %}
            {% if inside_item %}
              </div>
            {% endif %}  
            <div class="pricing-cards-{{ section.id }} {% if block.settings.active_default %}active{% endif %}" data-id="{{ block.id }}">     
              {% assign inside_item = true %}                
          {% elsif block.type == 'card' %}
            <div class="pricing-card-{{ section.id }} pricing-card-{{ block.id }}">
              <div class="pricing-card-top-{{ section.id }}">
                {% if block.settings.title != blank %}
                  <p class="pricing-title-{{ section.id }} pricing-title-{{ block.id }}">{{ block.settings.title }}</p>
                {% endif %}
                {% if block.settings.text != blank %}
                  <div class="pricing-text-{{ section.id }} pricing-text-{{ block.id }}">{{ block.settings.text }}</div>
                {% endif %}
              </div>
              
              <div class="pricing-card-bottom-{{ section.id }}">
                {% if block.settings.price_text != blank %}
                  <div class="pricing-price-{{ section.id }} pricing-price-{{ block.id }}"><p>{{ block.settings.price_text }}</p><span>{{ price_second_text }}</span></div>
                {% endif %}
                {% if block.settings.button_text != blank %}
                  <a href="{{ block.settings.url }}" class="pricing-card-button-{{ section.id }} pricing-card-button-{{ block.id }}">
                    <p class="pricing-card-button-inner-{{ section.id }} pricing-card-button-inner-{{ block.id }}">
                      {{ block.settings.button_text }}
                      {% if block.settings.button_style == "non_outline_arrow" or block.settings.button_style == "outline_arrow" %}
                        <svg width="192" height="192" viewBox="0 0 192 192" fill="none" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg">
                          <path d="M187.827 98.7858C188.123 98.4749 188.123 98.4749 188.123 98.1761C188.419 97.8652 188.419 97.5663 188.704 97.5663C189 96.9566 189 96.6458 189 96.0361C189 95.4263 189 94.8166 188.704 94.5058C188.704 94.195 188.408 93.8961 188.123 93.5852C188.123 93.2744 187.827 93.2744 187.827 92.9755L103.287 4.21945C102.41 3.29889 101.533 3 100.668 3C99.791 3 98.6295 3.31083 98.0488 4.21945C97.1719 5.14 96.8872 6.06058 96.8872 6.96919C96.8872 7.88974 97.1833 9.10918 98.0488 9.7189L175.587 92.0539H6.79206C4.75371 92.0539 3 93.895 3 96.0351C3 98.1751 4.75365 100.016 6.79206 100.016H175.575L97.7543 182.042C96.2967 183.572 96.2967 186.322 97.7543 187.852C99.2119 189.383 101.831 189.383 103.288 187.852L187.827 98.7858Z" fill="black"></path>
                          <path fill-rule="evenodd" clip-rule="evenodd" d="M188.607 97.5657C188.432 97.5657 188.365 97.6788 188.27 97.8382C188.211 97.9378 188.141 98.0554 188.027 98.1748C188.027 98.4734 188.027 98.4734 187.731 98.7839L103.281 187.759C101.825 189.287 99.2085 189.287 97.7524 187.759C96.2963 186.23 96.2963 183.483 97.7524 181.954L175.492 100.013L6.88489 100.013C4.8486 100.013 3.09677 98.1739 3.09677 96.036C3.09677 93.8982 4.84866 92.059 6.88489 92.059L175.504 92.059L98.0465 9.80878C97.182 9.19968 96.8862 7.9815 96.8862 7.0619C96.8862 6.15422 97.1706 5.2346 98.0465 4.315C98.6267 3.40732 99.787 3.0968 100.663 3.0968C101.527 3.0968 102.403 3.39539 103.279 4.315L187.731 92.9796C187.731 93.1274 187.804 93.2021 187.877 93.2774C187.952 93.3543 188.027 93.4319 188.027 93.5887C188.046 93.6098 188.066 93.6308 188.085 93.6518C188.338 93.9267 188.584 94.1935 188.606 94.4689C188.607 94.482 188.607 94.4951 188.607 94.5083C188.903 94.8188 188.903 95.4279 188.903 96.037C188.903 96.6461 188.903 96.9566 188.607 97.5657ZM191.489 93.2767C191.79 93.8661 191.89 94.4204 191.934 94.7363C192.001 95.2226 192 95.7194 192 95.9856L192 96.037C192 96.0544 192 96.0729 192 96.0926C192 96.3523 192.001 96.8096 191.924 97.2931C191.828 97.8884 191.64 98.41 191.393 98.9184L190.546 100.663H190.212C190.127 100.759 190.038 100.852 189.988 100.905L189.974 100.92L105.527 189.891C102.85 192.701 98.1865 192.704 95.51 189.895C94.1476 188.464 93.5636 186.587 93.5636 184.857C93.5636 183.128 94.1468 181.252 95.5071 179.822M191.489 93.2767C191.316 92.7908 191.078 92.4357 190.938 92.2406C190.903 92.1912 190.866 92.142 190.828 92.0939V91.7408L105.522 2.17912C104.076 0.661813 102.397 0 100.663 0C99.3914 0 97.0569 0.401401 95.6212 2.37737C94.3151 3.83819 93.7895 5.45521 93.7895 7.0619C93.7895 8.26663 94.1183 10.6061 95.9608 12.111L168.333 88.9622L6.88489 88.9622C2.9981 88.9622 0 92.3316 0 96.036C0 99.7405 2.99801 103.11 6.88489 103.11L168.285 103.11" fill="black"></path>
                          <path d="M169.5 104L16.5 102.5V90H171L97.5 10.5V7L107.5 4.5C131.167 29.6667 180.2 81.5 187 87.5C193.8 93.5 191.5 99 189.5 101L105.5 184L94 181.5L169.5 104Z" fill="black"></path>
                        </svg>
                      {% endif %}
                    </p>
                  </a> 
                {% endif %} 

                <div class="pricing-card-table-{{ section.id }}">
                  {% if block.settings.first_left_text != blank and block.settings.first_right_text != blank %}
                    <div class="pricing-card-table-item-{{ section.id }} pricing-card-table-item-{{ block.id }}">
                      <p class="pricing-card-table-left-{{ section.id }} pricing-card-table-left-{{ block.id }}">{{ block.settings.first_left_text }}</p>
                      <p class="pricing-card-table-right-{{ section.id }} pricing-card-table-right-{{ block.id }}">{{ block.settings.first_right_text }}</p>
                    </div>
                  {% endif %}
                  {% if block.settings.second_left_text != blank and block.settings.second_right_text != blank %}
                    <div class="pricing-card-table-item-{{ section.id }} pricing-card-table-item-{{ block.id }}">
                      <p class="pricing-card-table-left-{{ section.id }} pricing-card-table-left-{{ block.id }}">{{ block.settings.second_left_text }}</p>
                      <p class="pricing-card-table-right-{{ section.id }} pricing-card-table-right-{{ block.id }}">{{ block.settings.second_right_text }}</p>
                    </div>
                  {% endif %}
                  {% if block.settings.third_left_text != blank and block.settings.third_right_text != blank %}
                    <div class="pricing-card-table-item-{{ section.id }} pricing-card-table-item-{{ block.id }}">
                      <p class="pricing-card-table-left-{{ section.id }} pricing-card-table-left-{{ block.id }}">{{ block.settings.third_left_text }}</p>
                      <p class="pricing-card-table-right-{{ section.id }} pricing-card-table-right-{{ block.id }}">{{ block.settings.third_right_text }}</p>
                    </div>
                  {% endif %}
                  {% if block.settings.fourth_left_text != blank and block.settings.fourth_right_text != blank %}
                    <div class="pricing-card-table-item-{{ section.id }} pricing-card-table-item-{{ block.id }}">
                      <p class="pricing-card-table-left-{{ section.id }} pricing-card-table-left-{{ block.id }}">{{ block.settings.fourth_left_text }}</p>
                      <p class="pricing-card-table-right-{{ section.id }} pricing-card-table-right-{{ block.id }}">{{ block.settings.fourth_right_text }}</p>
                    </div>
                  {% endif %}
                  {% if block.settings.fifth_left_text != blank and block.settings.fifth_right_text != blank %}
                    <div class="pricing-card-table-item-{{ section.id }} pricing-card-table-item-{{ block.id }}">
                      <p class="pricing-card-table-left-{{ section.id }} pricing-card-table-left-{{ block.id }}">{{ block.settings.fifth_left_text }}</p>
                      <p class="pricing-card-table-right-{{ section.id }} pricing-card-table-right-{{ block.id }}">{{ block.settings.fifth_right_text }}</p>
                    </div>
                  {% endif %}
                </div>
              </div> 
            </div>      
          {% endif %}              
        {% endfor %}
        {% if inside_item %}
          </div>
        {% endif %}
      </div> 

      {% for block in section.blocks %}
        {% case block.type %}
          {% when 'button' %}
            {% if block.settings.button != blank %}                 
              <a href="{{ block.settings.url }}" class="pricing-button-{{ block.id }}">
                <p class="pricing-button-inner-{{ block.id }}">
                  {{ block.settings.button }}
                  {% if block.settings.button_style == "non_outline_arrow" or block.settings.button_style == "outline_arrow" %}
                    <svg width="192" height="192" viewBox="0 0 192 192" fill="none" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg">
                      <path d="M187.827 98.7858C188.123 98.4749 188.123 98.4749 188.123 98.1761C188.419 97.8652 188.419 97.5663 188.704 97.5663C189 96.9566 189 96.6458 189 96.0361C189 95.4263 189 94.8166 188.704 94.5058C188.704 94.195 188.408 93.8961 188.123 93.5852C188.123 93.2744 187.827 93.2744 187.827 92.9755L103.287 4.21945C102.41 3.29889 101.533 3 100.668 3C99.791 3 98.6295 3.31083 98.0488 4.21945C97.1719 5.14 96.8872 6.06058 96.8872 6.96919C96.8872 7.88974 97.1833 9.10918 98.0488 9.7189L175.587 92.0539H6.79206C4.75371 92.0539 3 93.895 3 96.0351C3 98.1751 4.75365 100.016 6.79206 100.016H175.575L97.7543 182.042C96.2967 183.572 96.2967 186.322 97.7543 187.852C99.2119 189.383 101.831 189.383 103.288 187.852L187.827 98.7858Z" fill="black"></path>
                      <path fill-rule="evenodd" clip-rule="evenodd" d="M188.607 97.5657C188.432 97.5657 188.365 97.6788 188.27 97.8382C188.211 97.9378 188.141 98.0554 188.027 98.1748C188.027 98.4734 188.027 98.4734 187.731 98.7839L103.281 187.759C101.825 189.287 99.2085 189.287 97.7524 187.759C96.2963 186.23 96.2963 183.483 97.7524 181.954L175.492 100.013L6.88489 100.013C4.8486 100.013 3.09677 98.1739 3.09677 96.036C3.09677 93.8982 4.84866 92.059 6.88489 92.059L175.504 92.059L98.0465 9.80878C97.182 9.19968 96.8862 7.9815 96.8862 7.0619C96.8862 6.15422 97.1706 5.2346 98.0465 4.315C98.6267 3.40732 99.787 3.0968 100.663 3.0968C101.527 3.0968 102.403 3.39539 103.279 4.315L187.731 92.9796C187.731 93.1274 187.804 93.2021 187.877 93.2774C187.952 93.3543 188.027 93.4319 188.027 93.5887C188.046 93.6098 188.066 93.6308 188.085 93.6518C188.338 93.9267 188.584 94.1935 188.606 94.4689C188.607 94.482 188.607 94.4951 188.607 94.5083C188.903 94.8188 188.903 95.4279 188.903 96.037C188.903 96.6461 188.903 96.9566 188.607 97.5657ZM191.489 93.2767C191.79 93.8661 191.89 94.4204 191.934 94.7363C192.001 95.2226 192 95.7194 192 95.9856L192 96.037C192 96.0544 192 96.0729 192 96.0926C192 96.3523 192.001 96.8096 191.924 97.2931C191.828 97.8884 191.64 98.41 191.393 98.9184L190.546 100.663H190.212C190.127 100.759 190.038 100.852 189.988 100.905L189.974 100.92L105.527 189.891C102.85 192.701 98.1865 192.704 95.51 189.895C94.1476 188.464 93.5636 186.587 93.5636 184.857C93.5636 183.128 94.1468 181.252 95.5071 179.822M191.489 93.2767C191.316 92.7908 191.078 92.4357 190.938 92.2406C190.903 92.1912 190.866 92.142 190.828 92.0939V91.7408L105.522 2.17912C104.076 0.661813 102.397 0 100.663 0C99.3914 0 97.0569 0.401401 95.6212 2.37737C94.3151 3.83819 93.7895 5.45521 93.7895 7.0619C93.7895 8.26663 94.1183 10.6061 95.9608 12.111L168.333 88.9622L6.88489 88.9622C2.9981 88.9622 0 92.3316 0 96.036C0 99.7405 2.99801 103.11 6.88489 103.11L168.285 103.11" fill="black"></path>
                      <path d="M169.5 104L16.5 102.5V90H171L97.5 10.5V7L107.5 4.5C131.167 29.6667 180.2 81.5 187 87.5C193.8 93.5 191.5 99 189.5 101L105.5 184L94 181.5L169.5 104Z" fill="black"></path>
                    </svg>
                  {% endif %}
                </p>
              </a>     
            {% endif %} 
          {% when 'caption' %}
            {% if block.settings.text != blank %}
              <div class="pricing-bottom-text-{{ block.id }}">{{ block.settings.text }}</div>
            {% endif %}  
          {% else %}
            
        {% endcase %}
      {% endfor %}
    </div>
</div>

<script>
  function initPricingTable5() {
    const tabs = document.querySelectorAll('.pricing-toggle-{{ section.id }}');
    const cards = document.querySelectorAll('.pricing-cards-{{ section.id }}');

    // let firstTab = null;
    // let firstCard = null;

    // tabs.forEach(tab => {
    //   if (!firstTab) firstTab = tab;
    // });

    // cards.forEach(card => {
    //   if (!firstCard) firstCard = card;
    // });

    // if (firstTab && firstCard) {
    //   firstTab.classList.add('active');
    //   firstCard.classList.add('active');
    // }

    tabs.forEach(tab => {
      tab.addEventListener("click", () => {
        tabs.forEach(otherTab => otherTab.classList.remove('active'));
        cards.forEach(otherCard => otherCard.classList.remove('active'));

        const targetId = tab.id;
        const targetCard = Array.from(cards).find(card => card.dataset.id === targetId);
        if (targetCard) {
          targetCard.classList.add('active');
          tab.classList.add('active');
        }
      });
    });
  }

  document.addEventListener('DOMContentLoaded', initPricingTable5);

  if (Shopify.designMode) {
    document.addEventListener('shopify:section:unload', initPricingTable5);
    document.addEventListener('shopify:section:load', initPricingTable5);
  }
</script>

tab_bg_active_gradient.label: Background gradient
tab_bg_active_gradient.description: Remove gradient to replace with solid colors

background_gradient.label: Section background gradient
background_gradient.description: Remove gradient to replace with solid colors
